name: Downloader for Tik Tok
description: Want to download Tik Tok video to your phone? Now its easy! You just need to download the application Downloader for Tik Tok. Just a few clicks and Downloader for Tik Tok will help you to download video jokes and funny videos from Tik Tok without a watermark, absolutely for free. Share funny videos and gags with friends.  How to save video on a phone? 1. Open the Tik Tok or TikTok Lite app. 2. Click on a share button 3. Click the copy link button. 4. Open the Downloader for Tik Tok app and click download.  Where are the videos stored? All videos saved in the application will also be saved in the gallery of your phone, in the Video from TikTok folder  Use Downloader for Tik Tok and enjoy the ease and convenience of downloading videos to your phone.  Warning: 1. Re-uploading video is not welcome, please get owner approval. 2. This application is not associated with TikTok, musical ly or ByteMod Pte. Ltd. 3. Any unauthorized downloading or reloading of content and/or infringing intellectual property rights is the sole responsibility of the user.
